General.Name: Southern Fertilizer JSC
General.Description: The Southern Fertilizer Joint Stock Company manufactures and distributes in chemicals and fertilizers in Vietnam. The company offers machinery equipment parts and materials for fertilizers and chemical production. It also involved in the manufacturing business of cement; PP and PE packaging; and food and poultry products, as well as infrastructure, residential area, and real estate businesses. The Southern Fertilizer Joint Stock Company was founded in 1976 and is based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
